about_the_game:
About us:
Welcome to pay attention to us - Tao universal game studio, learn about the latest developments in the game

About this game:
Eden Escape is a science fiction suspense style text AVG decryption game. You need to uncover the truth step by step by discovering clues and props. Don't miss clues. Your choice and performance will affect the development of the plot and the trend of the characters.

Game features:
·Women with different personalities and their stories need you to explore~
·The scene style in the near future, coupled with the tone of suspense decryption, is a refreshing experience.
·The hidden painting and plot need to be triggered carefully. Every character you meet can bring you different feelings.
·The interlocking plot, appropriate suspense and appropriate and necessary puzzle solving make the game experience smooth.

Experiencer, welcome to Eden.

name: 逃离伊甸 EDEN ESCAPE 生命梦之轮回

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Gef
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Eden Escape is a science fiction suspense style text AVG puzzle game. Please enjoy the space full of eternal happiness! Just... The sudden crisis, the invisible shadow, the silent manager, the untranslatable information, and the threat hidden in the dark are tearing all this apart.
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, English, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
